H0.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Wisdom

H1.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Piety

H2.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Knowledge

H3.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. fear

A4.text: Wisdom is considered the first and the greatest of the gifts.

A5.text: The gift of piety corresponds to the virtue of justice.

A6.text: Roman Catholicism counts this fear as one of the seven gifts of the Holy Spirit.

A7.text: In some contexts it is called wonder and awe in God's presence, such as the enumeration of the seven gifts in the Roman Rite of the sacrament of Confirmation.
